Posts.Content: Apr 28, 2009 12:11AM - edited Apr 28, 2009 12:12AM by Sandra123 Bizymom, I just went through the entire procedure you're going to go through.  The initial surgery was uncomforable after but there were all the pain meds I needed.  The expanders were not a problem for me and I was amazed at how they worked as the weeks went by. Just two weeks ago I got the expanders removed and the implants put in.  They look wonderful, a little firm but I'm told they'll soften up within a couple of months. Going to get nipples in August. Stay tough, we're all here to help you get through this!
